title: suckerfish menu & css help
content:
Hello. I'm working on a pretty simple MT based site for a non-profit friend & client and want to incorporate a 3-level 'suckerfish' dropdown menu in the sidebar, for navigation to the various sections, subsections & some individual articles on the site.

I've got the code, but need a bit of help to make it work correctly and look pretty. I will of course be happy to pay someone to help me, plus will buy drinks at Typecon.

Anyone interested?

JLT \> [hundertwasser@yahoo.com](mailto:hundertwasser@yahoo.com)
author: jlt
